tool_description: Processes tuition and fee payments for course enrollment, handling various payment methods and generating transaction records.

course_codes.description: List of course codes for payment calculation

payment_method.description: Payment method: credit_card, bank_transfer, financial_aid, payment_plan

payment_amount.description: Specific payment amount (if different from calculated total)

apply_discounts.description: Whether to apply eligible student discounts

installment_plan.description: Whether to set up payment installment plan

due_date.description: Payment due date in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid payment method: Use one of [credit_card, bank_transfer, financial_aid, payment_plan].
Payment amount mismatch: Provided payment amount does not match calculated tuition and fees.
Financial aid insufficient: Student's financial aid does not cover the enrollment costs.
Payment processing failed: External payment processor returned an error.
Invalid due date: Due date must be in the future and in ISO 8601 format.
Student not eligible for installment plan: Student does not meet criteria for payment plan enrollment.
usage: Provide student_id, course_codes, academic_term, and payment_method. Optionally specify payment_amount, payment_reference, and payment options. The tool calculates fees, processes payment, and returns transaction details.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the payment transaction

payment_status.description: Status of payment processing (completed, pending, failed)

tuition_amount.description: Tuition portion of the total amount

fees_amount.description: Fees portion of the total amount

discounts_applied.description: List of discounts applied to the payment
